titles: Advice to the ladies of London, in the choice of their husbands. To an excellent new court tune. This may be printed, R.P.
author: D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723.
publisher: Printed for J. Back, at the Black Boy, [...] draw-bridge on London-Bridge.,
notes: Date of publication suggested by Wing
Verse: "Ladies of London both wealthy and fair ..."
